Title: Removes the prohibition relating to certain discovery of testimony
Summary: Removes the prohibition relating to certain discovery of testimony in certain actions for medical, dental or podiatric malpractice.
LawCode: Amd ยง6527, Ed L; amd ยง2805-m, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law and the public health law, in relation to removing the prohibition relating to certain discovery of testimony
